item.title: Avoid Phishing and Malicious Emails in 2024
item.description: 1. Verify sender’s email address The sender’s origin contains 2 parts: The display name and email@domain.com. Nhat Vo <nhat.vo@awakenservices.net> Display name: Nhat Vo Email address: nhat.vo@awakenservices.net The display name can be forged while email address cannot. This is an example of phishing emails: Nhat Vo <nhat.vo@123456.com> Display name: Nhat Vo Email address: nhat.vo@12345.com 2. Don’t Trust Unsolicited Emails Be cautious of unexpected emails, especially those requesting personal information or urging you to click on links.
